hanzi-su-wiki:
輔

Значения

Помогать

Мнемоника

Главная 甫 часть телеги 車, обода, держась за которые можно помочь вращению колёс.

Варианты

辅

fǔ
to assist; to complement; auxiliary
помогать; дополнять; вспомогательный

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 辅)
Pictophonetic: 甫 indicates the sound; 車 (cart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
輔導 [ fǔ dǎo ]: to give guidance; to mentor; to counsel; to coach; to tutor
輔助 [ fǔ zhù ]: to assist; to aid; supplementary; auxiliary; subsidiary
輔導員 [ fǔ dǎo yuán ]: coach (teacher or trainer)
輔導班 [ fǔ dǎo bān ]: tutorial class; remedial class; preparatory course

heisig_chinese_memo: A military car hung with hundreds of &nbsp
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you want to have your wedding in a car you're going to need a lot of help. Cars are pretty small compared to weddings, so if you don't get help from everyone you know you won't be able to pull it off.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture all of your close friends coming to help you squeeze everything for the wedding into your car.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You can't just ask for help on the day of the wedding, either. You have to schedule (すけ) getting your friends' help ahead of time. They might have pretty tight schedules too, so makes sure you plan early!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine calling all your friends and scheduling when you will get their help. Make sure you have your day planner ready!
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 甫 (はじめて、ホ、フ впервые, сначала).
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 十 (десять), 用 (употреблять), 車 (автомобиль)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your first time (甫) in the car (車), you need help
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To supplement his business a cart owner decorates his cart with his dog tags to draw in customers who respect his previous military service.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from " car " to " pu ", " pu " is the sound side, the original meaning is two straight wood tied to the outside of the wheel, can increase the load capacity of the wheel (refer to the Chinese Dictionary). "poetry. Xiaoya. "New Years Day": "The car is loaded, but Erfu is abandoned." Kong Yingdashu: "Auxiliary is something that can be liberated, so that people are bound to the spokes, so as to prevent auxiliary." The latter is extended to mean auxiliary, auxiliary.

Inscriptions on Jin Wen said that he was assisting, and Zhongshan Wang Fanghu: "Get the talents and talents to help each other." "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou Shang": "There are also microzi, Weizhong, Prince Bigan, Jizi, Jiaoqi, all wise men, and complement each other." Also used as the name of the country and the official name. Assistant teacher 𠭰簋: "Rong Bai (Bo) enters the right assistant teacher 𠭰". Guo Moruo believes that "auxiliary teacher" means "Zhou Li. The "Pianshi" in "Chunguan" is the official name.
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions from " car " to " pu ", " pu " is the sound side, the original meaning is two straight wood tied to the outside of the wheel, can increase the load capacity of the wheel (see Chinese Dictionary).
humanum_full_description:
金文從「車」從「甫」，「甫」是聲旁，本義是綁在車輪外旁的兩條直木，能增強車輪的載重力(參漢語大字典)。《詩．小雅．正月》：「其車既載，乃棄爾輔。」孔穎達疏：「輔是可解脫之物，蓋如今人縛杖於輻，以防輔事也。」後引申為輔助、佐助之意。

　　金文表示輔佐，中山王方壺：「得賢才良佐賈，以輔相厥身。」《孟子．公孫丑上》：「又有微子、微仲、王子比干、箕子、膠鬲，皆賢人也，相與輔相之。」又用作國族名和職官名。輔師𠭰簋：「榮白(伯)入右輔師𠭰」。郭沫若認為「輔師」即《周禮．春官》的「鎛師」，是官名。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「車」從「甫」，「甫」是聲旁，本義是綁在車輪外旁的兩條直木，能增強車輪的載重力(參漢語大字典)。

  • ⿰ Left to right

    • 甫 [ fǔ ] to begin; man, father; great; a distance of ten li
①古代夾在車輪外旁的直木，每輪二木，用以增加車輪載重支力。
②幫助，佐助：輔佐(協助，多指政治上)。輔弼。輔助。輔導。輔相(xiàng)。
③古代指京城附近地區：畿輔。
④人的頰骨：輔車相依(“車”，指牙牀，喻互相依存)。

金文從「 車 」從「 甫 」，「 甫 」是聲旁，本義是綁在車輪外旁的兩條直木，能增強車輪的載重力(參漢語大字典)。《詩．小雅．正月》：「其車既載，乃棄爾輔。」孔穎達疏：「輔是可解脫之物，蓋如今人縛杖於輻，以防輔事也。」後引申為輔助、佐助之意。 金文表示輔佐，中山王方壺：「得賢才良佐賈，以輔相厥身。」《孟子．公孫丑上》：「又有微子、微仲、王子比干、箕子、膠鬲，皆賢人也，相與輔相之。」又用作國族名和職官名。輔師𠭰簋：「榮白(伯)入右輔師𠭰」。郭沫若認為「輔師」即《周禮．春官》的「鎛師」，是官名。
Bronze inscriptions from " car" to " pu", " pu" is the sound side, the original meaning is two straight wood tied to the outside of the wheel, can increase the load capacity of the wheel (refer to the Chinese Dictionary). "poetry. Xiaoya. "New Years Day": "The car is loaded, but Erfu is abandoned." Kong Yingdashu: "Auxiliary is something that can be liberated, so that people are bound to the spokes, so as to prevent auxiliary." The latter is extended to mean auxiliary, auxiliary. Inscriptions on Jin Wen said that he was assisting, and Zhongshan Wang Fanghu: "Get the talents and talents to help each other." "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou Shang": "There are also microzi, Weizhong, Prince Bigan, Jizi, Jiaoqi, all wise men, and complement each other." Also used as the name of the country and the official name. Assistant teacher 𠭰簋: "Rong Bai (Bo) enters the right assistant teacher 𠭰". Guo Moruo believes that "auxiliary teacher" means "Zhou Li. The "Pianshi" in "Chunguan" is the official name.

輔字的基本解释

輔
fǔ
见“辅”。

輔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǔ］
［《廣韻》扶雨切，上麌，奉。］
“辅1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)车轮外旁增缚夹毂的两条直木，用以增强轮辐载重支力。
(2)指车轮内面接辐而外面顶住轮圈的内缘。
(3)面颊。
(4)辅助。
(5)依附，亲附。
(6)卫护，屏藩。
(7)从属，次要。
(8)辅佐之臣。
(9)指府吏。古代官署中的办事人员。
(10)指京城附近起辅卫作用的郡邑。
(11)指朋友。
(12)指辅骨。
(13)星名。
(14)弓。矫正弓弩的器具。参见“輔檠”。
(15)指小木。即扶苏。
(16)书法术语。用小指紧靠无名指后，辅持该指，使握笔有力。
(17)姓。春秋有辅果。见《国语·晋语九》。

輔字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輔； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1244第05
【廣韻】扶雨切【五音集韻】父雨切，?音?。【說文】人頰骨也。【易·咸卦】咸其輔頰舌。【註】輔，上頷也。【左傳·僖五年】輔車相依。　又【正韻】車輔，兩旁夾車木也。【詩·小雅】乃棄爾輔。【疏】輔以佐車，可解脫之物。今人縛杖于輻，以孩輔車也。　又【廣韻】毗輔，相助也，弼也。【增韻】扶也。【易·泰卦】輔相天地之宜。【書·說命】朝夕納誨，以輔台德。　又以物相將曰輔。【周禮·地官】鄕大夫以旌節輔令則達之。【註】民雖以徵令行，其將之者無節，則不得通。　又四輔，官名。【禮·文王世子】設四輔。【註】謂師、保、疑、丞也。　又府史胥徒亦謂之輔。【周禮·天官·大宰】置其輔。【註】庶人在官者也。　又【韻會】四輔，星名。所以輔佐北極。　又三輔，郡名。漢京兆、左馮翊、右扶風。　又輔氏，地名。【左傳·宣十五年】秦伐晉，次于輔氏。　又龍輔，玉名。【左傳·昭二十九年】公使獻龍輔于齊侯。　又姓。晉智果別族爲輔氏。

考證：〔【詩·小雅】無棄爾輔。【

暂无。

auxiliary
Basic explanation of words
auxiliary
fǔ
See "auxiliary".
auxiliary
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [fǔ]
["Guangyun" Helping the rain to cut, go up, and bong. ]
Traditional characters of "辅1". Also called "1".
(1) Two straight woods attached to the clamp hub are added to the outer side of the wheel to increase the load-bearing force of the spokes.
(2) The inner surface of the wheel is connected to the spokes and the outer surface is against the inner edge of the rim.
(3) Cheeks.
(4) Assistance.
(5) Attachment, pro-attachment.
(6) Guardian, screen fan.
(7) Subordinate, secondary.
(8) Auxiliary minister.
(9) Refers to government officials. The clerks in the ancient government offices.
(10) Refers to the prefecture near the capital that serves as an auxiliary guard.
(11) Refers to friends.
(12) Refers to the auxiliary bone.
(13) Star name.
(14) Bow . Tools for correcting bows and crossbows. See "Fuxi".
(15) Refers to Xiaomu. That is Fusu.
(16) Calligraphy terms. Place your little finger close to the ring finger and hold that finger to make the pen strong.
(17) Last name. There are auxiliary fruits in spring and autumn. See "Mandarin · Jin Language Nine".
auxiliary
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　辅; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1244 No. 05
[Guang Yun] Help Yuqie [Pentagram Rhyme] Father Yuqie, "Yin?". 【Said the text】Human cheek bones are also. 【Yi·Xian Gua】Xian Qi assists cheek and tongue. [Note] Supplement, upper jaw also. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Five Years] The auxiliary vehicles are dependent on each other.　[Zhengyun] Car auxiliary, with car wood on both sides. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Naiqierfu. 【Sparse】Supplied with a car, something that can be liberated. Nowadays, people bind the rod to the spoke, and use the child to assist the car.　[Guangyun] Pifu, help each other, Biye. [Zeng Yun] Fu Ye. [Easy·Tai Gua] Complements the world and the earth. 【Book·Fate】Gathering in the morning and evening, to assist Taiwan's Germany.　I also supplemented it with things. [Zhou Li·Guan Guan] The doctor in China used the Jingjie auxiliary order to reach it. [Note] Although the people use levy orders, they will not be able to pass them if they are innocent.　Yu Sifu, official name. [Li·Wen Wang Shizi] Set up four auxiliary. [Note] It means teacher, guarantee, doubt, and Cheng Ye.　Youfu Shi Xutu is also called the auxiliary. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Da Zai】has his assistant. [Note] The generals are also official.　[Yunhui] Sifu, star name. So assist the North Pole.　And Sansuke, the name of the county. Han Jingzhao, Zuo Fengyi, You Fufeng.　Youfu's, place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Fifteen Years] Qin defeated Jin, second to Fu clan.　Yonglongfu, Yuming. [Zuo Zhuan·29th year of Zhao] The minister offered dragons to assist Qihou.　Another last name. Jin Zhiguo is the auxiliary clan. Textual research: [[Poetry·Xiaoya] Wuqierfu. 【

fǔ
вм. 辅
Radicals: 車, 甫  (car, wedding)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you want to have your wedding in a car you're going to need a lot of help. Cars are pretty small compared to weddings, so if you don't get help from everyone you know you won't be able to pull it off.
Picture all of your close friends coming to help you squeeze everything for the wedding into your car.
Reading Mnemonic
You can't just ask for help on the day of the wedding, either. You have to schedule (すけ) getting your friends' help ahead of time. They might have pretty tight schedules too, so makes sure you plan early!
Imagine calling all your friends and scheduling when you will get their help. Make sure you have your day planner ready!
